mapper.select: select clistingid, csku, ctitle, cdescription, iwebsiteid, ilanguage, icount, cchannel, productprice, ctargetcountry, ccountrycurrency, clanguage, googlecategory, cpath, cname, cstate, cresult, cfaultreason, createuser, cnodedata, cnodeid, dpulldate, dpushdate from t_merchants_product where clistingid in #{item}
select cnodeid from t_merchants_product where cnodeid in #{item}

select clistingid, csku, ctitle, cdescription, iwebsiteid, ilanguage, icount, cchannel, productprice, ctargetcountry, ccountrycurrency, clanguage, googlecategory, cpath, cname, cstate, cresult, cfaultreason, createuser, cnodedata, cnodeid, dpulldate, dpushdate from t_merchants_product where cnodeid in #{item}

SELECT M.iid,M.csku,M.iwebsiteid,M.ilanguage,M.ccountrycurrency,M.icount,M.googlecategory,M.cname,M.ctitle, M.cdescription,M.ctargetcountry,M.clanguage,M.cchannel,M.productprice,M.cnodeid,M.cnodedata FROM t_merchants_product M where m.iid in #{item}

select clistingid, csku, ctitle, cdescription, iwebsiteid, ilanguage, icount, cchannel, productprice, ctargetcountry, ccountrycurrency, clanguage, googlecategory, cpath, cname, cstate, cresult, cfaultreason, createuser, cnodedata, cnodeid, dpulldate, dpushdate from t_merchants_product where 1=1 ORDER BY cnodeid limit #{pageSize} offset (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_merchants_product ( clistingid, csku, ctitle, cdescription, iwebsiteid, ilanguage, icount, cchannel, productprice, ctargetcountry, ccountrycurrency, clanguage, googlecategory, cpath, cname, cstate, cresult, cfaultreason, createuser, cnodedata, cnodeid, dpulldate) values
(#{item.clistingid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.csku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ctitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iwebsiteid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.ilanguage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.icount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.cchannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ctargetcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ccountrycurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.googlecategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cfaultreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cnodedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cnodeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dpulldate,jdbcType=DATE} )

update.foreach:
update t_merchants_product
ctitle= #{item.ctitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cdescription=#{item.cdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cnodedata=#{item.cnodedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cstate=#{item.cstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cresult=#{item.cresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icount=#{item.icount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cchannel=#{item.cchannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productprice=#{item.productprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ccountrycurrency=#{item.ccountrycurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dpulldate=#{item.dpulldate},
dpushdate=#{item.dpushdate},
dupdatedate=now()
where cnodeid = #{item.cnodeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
SELECT feed.* from (SELECT 'online:'||f.clanguage||':'||f.country||':'||m.csku cnodeid,'online' cchannel, m.csku csku,b.icategory igooglecategoryid,d.ctitle ctitle,d.cdescription cdescription,d.ilanguageid ilanguage, m.iwebsiteid iwebsiteid,f.country ctargetcountry,f.ccurrency ccountrycurrency, f.clanguage clanguage,b.cpath googlecategory,b.cname cname from t_google_category_base b ,t_google_product_category_mapper m , t_google_product_detail d ,t_google_feeds_base f where b.iid=m.icategory and m.csku=d.csku and d.ilanguageid=f.ilanguageid
) feed where feed.cnodeid in #{item}
select cresult,cnodeid from t_merchants_product where cnodeid in #{item}
